title: Grand Swiss Hotel and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Indian, Italian, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine
description: Vegetarian restaurant serves all Indian cuisines, European cuisines and some Chinese and offers many vegan menu items. Specializes in group tours catering. Large seating capacity. Coach parking up to six coaches at a time plus 60 cars.
